node.name: ClickToBuy-Ecommerce-Web-Application
node.description: E-Commerce Web Application Built using JEE, JSP, Servlet, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML 5, CSS 3, Bootstrap 5, JSON, XML, Hibernate ORM, and MySql Database. It facilitates users to buy and sell products online.

node.name: Notepad-with-Speech-Recognition
node.description: Notepad with Speech Recognition is a Desktop Application built upon the idea of Accessibility , Security and Minimalism. Dependencies : API-Google Speech Recognition ; Libraries-PyPi ; GUI-Tkinter. Architecture :- MVC(Model View Controller).

node.name: MedGuide-Hospital-Management-System
node.description: Project to resolve various problems faced by patients, doctors, and hospitals. This Application acts as an Interface between all the mentioned groups. HIGHLIGHT: Patients can book an appointment based on OTP (One Time Password) sent to their mobile phones. Built upon DAO design pattern.

node.name: Competitive-Programming
node.description: Solutions to some problems on petty coding websites.Some are really good.

node.name: Java-Code-Snippets
node.description: Short Programs to learn Java concepts in depth.

node.name: C-Programs
node.description: Simple Code Snippets for Absolute Beginners written in Dennis Ritchie's Language.
